ADLMVPUStatus Struct Reference

Structure containing information about MultiVPU status. More...

Data Fields

int iSize
 Must be set to sizeof( ADLMVPUStatus ).
int iActiveAdapterCount
 Number of active adapters.
int iStatus
 MVPU status.
ADLAdapterLocation aAdapterLocation [4]
 PCI Bus/Device/Function for each active adapter participating in MVPU.

Detailed Description

Structure containing information about MultiVPU status.

This structure is used to store information about MultiVPU status. Ths structure is used by the ADL_Display_MVPUStatus_Get() function.

Field Documentation

int ADLMVPUStatus::iSize

Must be set to sizeof( ADLMVPUStatus ).

int ADLMVPUStatus::iActiveAdapterCount

Number of active adapters.

int ADLMVPUStatus::iStatus

MVPU status.

ADLAdapterLocation ADLMVPUStatus::aAdapterLocation[4]

PCI Bus/Device/Function for each active adapter participating in MVPU.
